lines.i: Measurement of carbon monoxide in patient's bloodstream

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.167"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11305)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10297)/@code="20563-3" Carboxyhemoglobin/?Hemoglobin.total in Blood (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10296)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11306)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ (CONF:10298)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.17 UCUM units will typically be "%".
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11305)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10297)/@code="20563-3" Carboxyhemoglobin/?Hemoglobin.total in Blood (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10296)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11306)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ (CONF:10298)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.17 UCUM units will typically be "%".
